seasonal_events.name: Summer Heatwave
seasonal_events.description: A wave of heat makes hunting difficult and water scarce.

quest.name: Find Water
quest.description: Locate a water source to keep the clan hydrated.

seasonal_events.name: Autumn Hunt
seasonal_events.description: Prey is abundant as the leaves fall. The clan works together to stockpile food.

quest.name: Hunt Together
quest.description: Participate in group hunting to bring back as much food as possible.

seasonal_events.name: Winter Solstice
seasonal_events.description: The clan gathers at Starcove to celebrate the shortest day of the year.

quest.name: Solstice Celebration
quest.description: Join the ceremony and help prepare offerings.
